text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Today's the day our training begins!<n>I'm so glad to work
with youuu!
choice_data_list: Same here! Let's start out strong!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! I'll put my all into whatever you<n>throw at me! Just tell
me what to do!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Oh yeah, you wanted to talk before<n>practice, right? What is
it? What<n>should we talk about?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Before starting formal training, I need<n>to properly
understand the racer and<n>her abilities.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
All the Umamusume without trainers<n>were drilled by
academy instructors,<n>and according to the notes they gave<n>
me...
choice_data_list:
You're constantly rushing during races, aren't
you?

You're constantly rushing during races, aren't
you?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Aaah! I get that a lot! But I have a<n>hard time keeping it cool...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Every Umamusume gets heated up in<n>a race, don't they? I
get caught up in<n>the energy—that feeling of, like,<n>"waaagh!"
I can't help it.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
My instructor at the academy used to<n>say, "You lay your
emotions<n>completely bare."

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Is that really true though? I always<n>thought that was pretty
normal.
choice_data_list: You know the story 60,000 Furlongs in Search of Mother?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
The story about Umako?! Yeah, yeah!<n>I know it! I saw the
anime! I even read<n>the book in school!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
What a great story, riiight?! The first<n>episode where Umako
finds the little<n>girl's lost carrot was so... touching!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ug... Hic... Umako! Such a kindchild! Waaah!
choice_data_list: You really do lay everything bare!
You really do lay everything bare!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Say whaaat?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
This extreme earnestness might<n>really be Winning Ticket's
weakness.<n>Still—

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hey, Trainer! You okay?! Did you get<n>lost in your own head?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Wait, wait, wait... Is how I'm behaving<n>really bad?!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Oh nooooo! How could I annoy you<n>like this? I'm useless...
I'm the<n>wooorst!
choice_data_list: There's nothing wrong with your behavior.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Really?!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
But even during tryouts, I got<n>overexcited and ended up in
fifth...
choice_data_list:
Someday, that personality of yours is going to
be a powerful weapon.

Someday, that personality of yours is going to
be a powerful weapon.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: You mean it?! A weapon... Yeah...<n>Yeah!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
If she can remember to let loose at<n>just the right time, her
earnest attitude<n>will be her greatest weapon.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
So what she needs to focus on now<n>is judging when that
right moment is.<n>She has to run according to a plan.
choice_data_list: Okay, Ticket, here's what you need to do!
Okay, Ticket, here's what you need to do!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Whoooah! What, what, what?
choice_data_list: Study like you've never studied before!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I have to... study?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Guhyaaagh! You gotta be kidding<n>meeeee!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Thus begins my days of arduous<n>training with Winning
Ticket.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hyaaaaagh! Phew!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: How was that, Trainer? I ran at full<n>speed!
choice_data_list:
Well, we're working on your pace, so
maintaining a steady time is more important...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: ...Time? What?! How'd I forget<n>thaaat?!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Sorry, I'll go again! Hyaaagh!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Finish in a minute! Finish in a minute!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Huh? I made it here in twenty<n>seconds. Is that too slow?
Too fast?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Aaaaagh! I dunnooooo!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Let's see. The favorite for this race<n>couldn't win it. But
why...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Ah! She didn't train enough! So if I try<n>extra hard in training,
it's in the bag!<n>You gotta train to gain!
choice_data_list: You don't think there might be another reason?
You don't think there might be another reason?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Another?! Like... like what?
choice_data_list:
She went too close on the turn and got
surrounded by the pack.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Gaaaaah! You're totally right!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's not really something that needs<n>saying, but using her
head's not her<n>strong point. It's a bit of an obstacle<n>in
training.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: But then...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Knock, knock! Coming in!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Heya, Trainer! I watched tons of<n>those racing videos I
borrowed<n>yesterday!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
And get this! I took notes on how I<n>could run better. You
gotta take a look!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Oh, it's late, huh? I didn't mean to<n>disturb you.
choice_data_list:
No problem! I see you're at full speed like
always.

No problem! I see you're at full speed like
always.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Nothing less!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I always pull out all the stops, but... I<n>dunno—I feel like I can
pull way more<n>stops than before!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I mean, you're serious about this,<n>right? About winning the
Derby!
choice_data_list: Yeah, that's what I promised, right?
Yeah, that's what I promised, right?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Right! I'm totally getting that vibe from<n>you! You've always
felt that way!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
My trainer really believes in me! It<n>gives me the energy to
try harder than<n>I've ever tried before!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Sooo... Thanks so muuuch!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The going was tough for a while<n>there, but with all the effort
she's<n>putting in, I really feel like she can<n>figure this out.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I know she has loads of room to<n>grow!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hey, Trainer! What did you think<n>about my running ideas?!
choice_data_list: They, well... Let's rethink them together!
They, well... Let's rethink them together!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: That baaad?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: She can do it... I'm pretty sure!
